object contains db parameters as property.

member.name: M:Simply.Data.FirstOperator.QueryFirst``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,System.Object,System.Data.IDbTransaction,Simply.Data.Interfaces.ICommandSetting)
member.summary: Get First Row of the Resultset as object instance.
member.param: Sql query. if parameterNamePrefix is ? and Query: Select * From TableName Where Column1 = ?p1? Then; Query For Oracle ==> Select * From TableName Where Column1 = :p1 Query For Sql Server ==> Select * From TableName Where Column1 = @p1 if parameterNamePrefix is null and Query: Select * From TableName Where Column1 = :p1 (for PostgreSql) no conversion occured. parameterNamePrefix will be set in ICommandSetting instance.
object contains db parameters as property.
member.returns: Returns first record as object instance.

member.returns: Returns first record as dynamic object instance.

member.summary: Get First Row of the Odbc Sql Query Resultset as object instance.
member.param: The ODBC SQL query ( Example: SELECT * FROM TABLE_NAME WHERE ID_COLUMN = ? ).
member.returns: Returns first record as object instance.

members.member:
Get First Row of the Resultset as dynamic object instance with async operation.
Database connection. Sql query. if parameterNamePrefix is ? and Query: Select * From TableName Where Column1 = ?p1? Then; Query For Oracle ==> Select * From TableName Where Column1 = :p1 Query For Sql Server ==> Select * From TableName Where Column1 = @p1 if parameterNamePrefix is null and Query: Select * From TableName Where Column1 = :p1 (for PostgreSql) no conversion occured. parameterNamePrefix will be set in ICommandSetting instance.
object contains db parameters as property. (Optional) Database transaction.> Command setting An asynchronous result that yields the first as dynamic.

object contains db parameters as property.
member.returns: An asynchronous result that yields a T.

member.name: M:Simply.Data.DbQueryTranslator.TranslateOdbcQuery(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String)
member.summary: The Translate Odbc Query to parametrized query.
member.returns: The Returns translated query and parameters in same array. First element of array is translated query and other elements are query parameters. Query : "SELECT T1.* FROM TABLE1 T1 WHERE T1.ID_COLUMN = ?" For Sql Server Result; "SELECT T1.* FROM TABLE1 T1 WHERE T1.ID_COLUMN = @p0", "@p0" For Oracle Result; "SELECT T1.* FROM TABLE1 T1 WHERE T1.ID_COLUMN = :p0", ":p0"

member.name: M:Simply.Data.DbQueryTranslator.TranslateOdbcQuery(Simply.Data.Enums.DbConnectionTypes,System.String)
member.summary: The Translate Odbc Query to parametrized query.
member.returns: The Returns translated query and parameters in same array. First element of array is translated query and other elements are query parameters. Query : "SELECT T1.* FROM TABLE1 T1 WHERE T1.ID_COLUMN = ?" For Sql Server Result; "SELECT T1.* FROM TABLE1 T1 WHERE T1.ID_COLUMN = @p0", "@p0" For Oracle Result; "SELECT T1.* FROM TABLE1 T1 WHERE T1.ID_COLUMN = :p0", ":p0"

member.param: if it is true overrated parameters set as output else will be throw error.

member.name: M:Simply.Data.SingleOperator.QuerySingle``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,System.Object,System.Data.IDbTransaction,Simply.Data.Interfaces.ICommandSetting)
member.summary: Get Single Row of the Resultset as object instance.
member.param: Sql query. if parameterNamePrefix is ? and Query: Select * From TableName Where Column1 = ?p1? Then; Query For Oracle ==> Select * From TableName Where Column1 = :p1 Query For Sql Server ==> Select * From TableName Where Column1 = @p1 if parameterNamePrefix is null and Query: Select * From TableName Where Column1 = :p1 (for PostgreSql) no conversion occured. parameterNamePrefix will be set in ICommandSetting instance.
object contains db parameters as property.
member.returns: Returns single record as object instance.

member.summary: Get Single Row of the Resultset as object instance.
member.returns: Returns single record as dynamic object instance.

member.summary: Get Single Row of the Odbc Sql Query Resultset as object instance.
member.param: The ODBC SQL query ( Example: SELECT * FROM TABLE_NAME WHERE ID_COLUMN = ? ).
member.returns: Returns single record as object instance.

member.param: Sql query. Select * From TableName Where Column1 = ?p1? parameterNamePrefix : ? Query For Oracle ==> Select * From TableName Where Column1 = :p1 Query For Sql Server ==> Select * From TableName Where Column1 = @p1 parameterNamePrefix will be set in ICommandSetting instance.
object contains db parameters as property.
member.returns: An asynchronous result that yields the single as dynamic.

member.param: Sql query. Select * From TableName Where Column1 = ?p1? parameterNamePrefix : ? Query For Oracle ==> Select * From TableName Where Column1 = :p1 Query For Sql Server ==> Select * From TableName Where Column1 = @p1 parameterNamePrefix will be set in ICommandSetting instance.
object contains db parameters as property.
member.returns: An asynchronous result that yields a T.
